description: A structured map of function-pair nesting within the SeedTree/HSD architecture. Each level of the tree is a recursive instantiation where the instructions of level _n prepare the substrate for level _n+1.

_0.responsibility: Hosts the primary V8 runtime and core HSD methods: .tie(), .syn(), .log().

_1.responsibility: Defines the high-level objective and manages shared state for all nested sub-functions.

_2.responsibility: Executes specific sub-tasks (I/O, API calls) and synchronizes results back to the _1 branch.

_n.responsibility: Enables arbitrary complexity while maintaining a flat topography of addressable memory (loci).
_n.nesting: Each _n level instructions contain the tie/syn logic for _n+1.

principles.function_pair: Every node consists of a Program (the logic) and an Asset (the data constructor).
principles.locational_addressing: The 'loci' string (e.g., _0.read_file.$1.capture.$2) provides a unique DNS for every event in the machine's life.
